name: Water and Sanitation (WHO WASH, 2021)
description:
Data cleaned using this script: https://github.com/owid/notebooks/blob/main/FionaSpooner/WASH/cleaning_who_wash_data.Rmd

Script removes erroneous negative values and rounds data to appropriate number of decimal places, 0 for integer, 2 otherwise.
source_name: Our World in Data catalog backport
